hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT attribute.id, attribute.attributeName, attribute.attributeType, attribute.tip, attribute.validValue, attribute.showed, attribute.modified, attribute.empty, attribute.articleFormat.id, attribute.articleFormat.fields FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.articleFormat.id = :formatId ORDER BY attribute.orders ASC, attribute.createTime DESC
DELETE FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.articleFormat.id = :id
DELETE FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.articleFormat.id IN (:ids)
FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.articleFormat.id = :formatId ORDER BY attribute.orders ASC, attribute.createTime
FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.articleFormat.id = :formateId AND attribute.attributeName = :attributeName ORDER BY attribute.orders ASC, attribute.createTime
FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.enumeration.id = :enumId AND attribute.articleFormat.id = :formatId ORDER BY attribute.orders ASC, attribute.createTime DESC
SELECT attribute.id, attribute.attributeType FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.articleFormat.id = :formatId
SELECT attribute.id, attribute.attributeName FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.articleFormat.id = :formatId ORDER BY attribute.orders ASC, attribute.createTime DESC
FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.articleFormat.id = :formatId ORDER BY attribute.orders ASC, attribute.createTime
SELECT attribute.id FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.articleFormat.id = :formatId AND attribute.attributeName IN (:attrName) ORDER BY attribute.orders ASC, attribute.createTime
FROM ArticleAttribute attribute WHERE attribute.enumeration.id IN (:enumerationIds) ORDER BY attribute.createTime
